description.en:
The year is 20XX, state of the world affairs is changing at a dizzying pace. This is particularly clear in the growing military strength of countries neighboring Japan.

In response to a near-skirmish with China over the much-disputed Senkaku Islands, Japan launched the state-of-the-art aircraft carrier [i]"Ibuki"[/i], equipped with the latest stealth aircrafts and formed a new fleet...

Captained by an Air Self-Defense Force, Ryota Akitsu, will he able to sort out inter-service differences?  And amidst this rising tension, what will be Japan's next move?

[center][i]From the award-winning author of "[url=https://mangadex.org/title/665]Zipang[/url]", "[url=https://mangadex.org/title/6580]A Spirit of the Sun[/url]" [b]Kaiji Kawaguchi[/b], comes a thrilling modern geopolitical dramas of the Far East Asia.[/i][/center]

[center][b]•Winner of the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Award 2017, 'Best General Manga'•[/b][/center]

Note: It can be assumed that the story take places in 2014, the year of the series initial release. As mentioned in the manga; "60 years since the establishment of JSDF" (1954).
